item.title: Things About Kafka
item.description: I work with Kafka a lot and this post is a summary of some interesting facts about it.

item.title: Emergence
item.description: Emergence is an interesting idea that complex behavior can emerge from group of very simple things that interact using a set of very simple rules. Emergence can be observed in lot of processes of nature. I present some of them here.
